author: jacopoc
msg: First commit of the "hhfacility" component a special purpose application for warehouse operations done using hand held devices.
The application is still in a very initial stage, a lot of cleanups still need to be done, but it is a nice start.
It has been contributed by Daniel Goodwin and Ray Barlow; see OFBIZ-226 for details.
Daniel, Ray many thanks to both of you.
